sense.gloss: peep, peeping

to peek (through a keyhole, gap, etc.)
to look down into (a ravine, etc.)
to peek into (a shop, bookstore, etc.)
to sneak a look at, to take a quick look at

to stick out (a scarf from a collar, etc.), to peek through (sky through a forest canopy, etc.)
to examine (an expression), to study (a face)
to face
to peep (through), to peek, to examine (esp. covertly)
to await (one's chance)
to guess, to infer, to gather, to surmise
peeking, peeping (e.g. through a hole, narrow gap)
to look into, to peer in
peeping Tom

r_ele.r: くだのあなからてんをのぞく

peep show, device with lens mounted on a stand or in a box to view enlarged pictures

sdata.j: ↑雲間↑↓くもま↓から↑太陽↑↓たいよう↓が↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いています。
sdata.e: You can see the sun peeking through the clouds.

sdata.j: ちょっと↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いてみないかい？
sdata.e: Do you want to look into it?

sdata.j: その↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓は↑窓↑↓まど↓から↑覗↑↓のぞ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んだ。
sdata.e: The boy peeped in at the window.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑戸棚↑↓とだな↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いた。
↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑部屋↑↓へや↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓かないでよ。
↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑壁↑↓かべ↓の↑裂↑↓さ↓け↑目↑↓め↓から↑外↑↓そと↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓いた。
sdata.e: I peeped out through a crack in the wall.

sdata.j: ↑箱↑↓はこ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んだ。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓の↑目↑↓め↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んだ。
sdata.e: He looked into the boy's eyes.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑目↑↓め↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓むと、↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓↑立↑↓た↓ち↑去↑↓さ↓った。
sdata.e: He looked into her eyes and suddenly went away.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓れの↑中↑↓なか↓を↑覗↑↓のぞ↓き↑込↑↓こ↓んだ↑時↑↓とき↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓がドアを↑閉↑↓し↓め、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓を↑真↑↓ま↓っ↑暗↑↓くら↓な↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓れに↑閉↑↓と↓じ↑込↑↓こ↓めてしまったのでした。
sdata.e: When she looked, he shut the door and locked her into the totally dark closet.

words.gloss: to peek (through a keyhole, gap, etc.)
